split

public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String split,
                                       java.lang.String s)
Splits String s at all occurences of the String 'split' and returns an array of the pieces. If s starts with 'split' then the first element of the returned array will be an empty String.

addVectors

public static java.util.Vector addVectors(java.util.Vector v1,
                                          java.util.Vector v2)
Replaces all occurences of the keys of "tags" in the string "str" with their values. Used to replace tags in a template by reading the template as a String (getFileAsString). A Hashtable "tags" would be filled with key-value pairs such as ("#TOOL#","Spade") and this method would then replace all occurences of the tag "#TOOL#" with "Spade" and return the filled-in template String.

Parameters:

s2 - The final delimiter
